title: Bug 124599 - Shortcut delete and menu delete act differently in table column.
description: Shortcut delete and menu delete act differently in table column.
OB: When using the shortcut delete and the menu delete options in a table column:
EB: I expected that both actions would have the same result, which is to delete the selected item in the table column.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Perform a shortcut delete action.
2. Perform a delete action using the context menu.
Expected result: Both actions should delete the selected item in the table column.
Actual result: In step 2, the whole grid in the group header was deleted. In step 3, the grid in the group header remained unaffected.
